lead_paragraph: KABUL -- Rahmatullah Rahmani remembered his first winter in Kabul. At first the kids thought sugar was falling from the sky because the snow was white and crystalline and melted on their tongues with a sweet taste unlike the often fetid camp water.

headline.main: Winter at an Afghan Refugee Camp: 'Is It Sugar From God?'
